A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I thought this was one of the best Star Wars movies ever made and honestly don't understand why so many people ranked it less than a single star. People have even said it made the prequels look good. THIS IS NOT TRUE. The prequels are nothing compared to this movie and anyone who thinks they are\, are totally disillusioned. Will the  director did make mistakes in The first act (Leia flying through the air)\, it is more than made up for in the second act which should be the model for flawless storytelling.
